item.title: 004-2022-622-Goblin_Cave
item.description: Summary We interogate the remaining goblin and free the prisoner who turns out to be [[Sildar]] and learn about the map the [[DnD/World/People/Gundrin]] had to the [[Wave_Echo_Cave]].

item.title: Forge of Spells
item.description: Meta This is a magical item. Assumed to be a blacksmith’s forge (at least that’s the assumption based on the name).

item.title: Wave Echo Cave
item.description: Originally map was carried by #Gundrin . There is a legend that the Forge of Spells is burried in the cave
